Hello, my name is

Andrew Wolson

I am a UX/UI Designer with a background in Print.

I have experience in Corporate design.

I worked for a corporation called EverBank for nearly 5 years. I started as a Graphic Designer and moved into a role as a UX Designer. I learned how a brand runs and opperatates. I saw how a re-brand works and how a creative organization opperates.
